    • getBoardPos

      public static Tile getBoardPos​(int row, int col)
      Gets the tile value for a target position in the board. Out of bounds accesses returns a wall.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the target tile
      col - the column of the target tile
      Returns:
      the value of the tile at the specified location

    • isLegalPlayerMove

      public static boolean isLegalPlayerMove​(int row, int col)
      Get whether or not pacman can legally move into a tile, given that he can access that tile from his current location
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the target tile
      col - the column of the target tile
      Returns:
      true if the tile is not a wall or the ghost house, false otherwise

    • isLegalGhostMove

      public static boolean isLegalGhostMove​(int row, int col, boolean leftHouse)
      Get whether or not a ghost can legally move into a tile, given that it can access that tile from its current location
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the target tile
      col - the column of the target tile
      leftHouse - whether or not the ghost has already left the ghost house since spawning
      Returns:
      true if the tile is a legal move, false otherwise

    • getPlayerPos

      public static Point getPlayerPos()
      Get a copy of the player's current position
      Returns:
      the current position of the player

    • getPlayerDir

      public static Point getPlayerDir()
      Get a copy of the current direction of the player A point can also be used to represent a 2D vector
      Returns:
      the player's current direction

    • setPlayerDirection

      public static void setPlayerDirection​(Point dir)
      Set the player to move in a specified direction. The direction should be one of the constant points defined in the Point class
      Parameters:
      dir - the new direction for the player
